sub_title: Data Protection & Privacy Manager at Liberty Global |  LL.M in Tech Law | CISA | CIPT | CFE
summary:
Experienced data protection & privacy expert with 16 years of professional experience: 8 years in the data protection & privacy field and background as a certified systems auditor( big4 and internal audit) and a certified fraud examiner. I am currently Data Protection & Privacy Manager at Liberty Global where I also represent the Privacy team at the Liberty Global Cloud Center of Excellence.

I hold a BSc degree in Computer Science and IT and a Masters in Technology Law and Policy which has supported my CIPT certification with gaining skills such as legal research, legal analysis and understanding how EU tech regulations work together. 

The diversity of my skills, knowledge and interests gives me the ability to think and evaluate issues and solutions multi-dimensionally. I am well versed in reviewing processes, systems, risk assessments, controls, audit/testing and mitigation. I have experience working in various industries such as Telco, Financial services, Aviation, Insurance, Hospitality, Automotive, Manufacturing, Construction, Utilities, Mining and Public sector. 

I've been honoured to speak at events such as the ACFE Global Annual Conference in Las Vegas, Hunger for Success Conference aimed at empowering African diaspora youth in Antwerp, as well as Digital African Woman at the European Parliament in Brussels.

Main duties:

•	Represents Compliance & Ethics at the Euroclear group Cloud Services Committee, providing advice on the following domains: data protection ,privacy and fraud risk.
•	Collaborates with the business by providing advice and recommendations for data protection and privacy risks impacting the business.
•	Data Protection & Privacy point of contact for IT divisions(6 divisions).
•	Part of the GDPR Implementation team and owner of key deliverables done with autonomy as well as collaborative. 
•	Develops training material and onboards Business Analysts on Privacy by Design
•	Monitors the relevant data protection regulatory developments from various EU bodies to assess impact for Euroclear.

•	Enterprise Architecture reference auditor
• Performed Risk Assessments, this included partnering with other stakeholders from business as well as Risk & Compliance.
